meanings.sent2: The composer cleverly incorporated a fugato into the sonata.
meanings.sent3: During the concert, the fugato seemed to dance playfully with the other instruments.
meanings.sent4: The fugato in the piece painted a vivid picture of musical conversation.
meanings.sent5: The audience was mesmerized by the intricate beauty of the fugato.
